question.title: Connecting to a databse in a VM
question.body:
I'm practicing with conexions between java and databases for a future project but i came to a "dead" end.

My problems is that i have (System A: 192.168.1.6) and (System B: 192.168.1.254) System B is a windows 10 virtual machine hosted in VirtualBox (Net card is set as bridge)

Anyways, im trying to connect to a database hosted in System B with XAMPP but i can't make it to work in any way from System A, this is the current line im trying to connect with:

Connection connect = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://192.168.1.254:3306/caleno", "root", "");

If I try to run my program on System A it won't work, but if i change the IP for localhost and move it to System B it will run normally, for this practice it doesn't really matters where do I run it but I'd like to know how to interconnect both computers, I will also share a github link at the end where I have the current state of my project in case someone wants to try it.

I tried creating new users on xamp with global access, following the stated previously on link 1 and changing XAMP configuration as stated on link 2

I also tried the following lines of code (just for the sake of trying) Connection connect = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://192.168.1.254:3306/caleno", "root", ""); Connection connect = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://192.168.1.254:8080/caleno", "root", ""); (this one is after doing the stuff related on link 2, with this one the program freezes and eventually later gives an error) Connection connect = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://192.168.1.254/caleno", "root", "");(i knew this one wouldnt work but worth a shot anyways)

Link 1

Link 2

Github Repository

Additionally, inside of /com/caleno/resources there is a folder named sql, where there is a copy of my databse (tho it only has 1 table and 1 registry inside of it)

Info related to my database connection is on java/com/caleno (database file) then on FXMLDocumentController is where I use this connection in order to continue

Please, understand that I´m just a student and I´m pretty new to this world so if possible I would appreciate if you could explain what I´m doing wrong, thanks a lot in advance
